metadata.description: Determine whether you want to install Microsoft Project & Visio in the image.
Determine whether you want to run the Virtual Desktop Optimization Tool on the image.
The distribution group that will recieve email alerts when an AIB image build either succeeds or fails.
Determine whether you want to enable build automation.  This feature will check daily if a new marketplace image exists and will initiate a build if the image date is newer than the last build date.
Determine whether you want to enable monitoring and alerting for the AIB image builds.
The target environment for the solution.

Any Azure polices that would affect the AIB build VM should have an exemption for the AIB staging resource group. Common examples are policies that push the Guest Configuration agent or the Microsoft Defender for Endpoint agent. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/image-builder-troubleshoot#prerequisites
The name of the Image Definition for the Shared Image Gallery.
The security type for the Image Definition.
The offer of the marketplace image.
The publisher of the marketplace image.
The SKU of the marketplace image.
The version of the marketplace image.
The storage SKU for the image version replica in the Shared Image Gallery.
The location for the resources deployed in this solution.
The name for the storage account containing the scripts & application installers.
The resource group name for the storage account containing the scripts & application installers.
The name of the container in the storage account containing the scripts & application installers.
The subnet name for the custom virtual network.
DO NOT MODIFY THIS VALUE! The timestamp is needed to differentiate deployments for certain Azure resources and must be set using a parameter.

The size of the virtual machine used for creating the image.  The recommendation is to use a 'Standard_D2_v2' size or greater for AVD. https://github.com/danielsollondon/azvmimagebuilder/tree/master/solutions/14_Building_Images_WVD
The name for the custom virtual network.
The resource group name for the custom virtual network.

variables.Role_AzureCloud: [if(equals(environment().name, 'AzureCloud'), createArray(createObject('resourceGroup', variables('ResourceGroup'), 'name', 'Image Template Build Automation', 'description', 'Allow Image Template build automation using a Managed Identity on an Automation Account.', 'permissions', createArray(createObject('actions', createArray('Microsoft.VirtualMachineImages/imageTemplates/run/action', 'Microsoft.VirtualMachineImages/imageTemplates/read', 'Microsoft.Compute/locations/publishers/artifacttypes/offers/skus/versions/read', 'Microsoft.Compute/locations/publishers/artifacttypes/offers/skus/read', 'Microsoft.Compute/locations/publishers/artifacttypes/offers/read', 'Microsoft.Compute/locations/publishers/read'))))), createArray())]

PrincipalId.value: [if(equals(variables('Roles')[range(0, length(variables('Roles')))[copyIndex()]].name, 'Image Template Build Automation'), reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('ResourceGroup')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('AutomationAccount_{0}', parameters('Timestamp'))), '2020-10-01').outputs.principalId.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('ResourceGroup')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('UserAssignedIdentity_{0}', parameters('Timestamp')))).outputs.userAssignedIdentityPrincipalId.value)]

variables.ProjectOffice: [if(parameters('DeployProjectVisio'), createArray(createObject('type', 'File', 'name', 'Download the Office Deployment Tool with custom XML', 'sourceUri', format('{0}office.zip', parameters('StorageUri')), 'destination', 'C:\temp\office.zip', 'sha256Checksum', toLower('37d222cdf71e9519872e6c24fbc7c30fbd230419710c5a1d7ef3c227c261e41b')), createObject('type', 'PowerShell', 'name', 'Install Microsoft Project & Visio', 'runElevated', true(), 'runAsSystem', true(), 'scriptUri', format('{0}projectVisio.ps1', parameters('StorageUri')))), createArray())]
variables.VDOT: [if(parameters('DeployVirtualDesktopOptimizationTool'), createArray(createObject('type', 'PowerShell', 'name', 'Download & Run the Virtual Desktop Optimization Tool', 'runElevated', true(), 'runAsSystem', true(), 'scriptUri', format('{0}vdot.ps1', parameters('StorageUri'))), createObject('type', 'WindowsRestart', 'restartTimeout', '5m')), createArray())]

Alerts.name: Azure Image Builder - Build Failure
Alerts.description: Sends an error alert when a build fails on an image template for Azure Image Builder.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "Image Template build failed"

Alerts.name: Azure Image Builder - Build Success
Alerts.description: Sends an informational alert when a build succeeds on an image template for Azure Image Builder.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "Image Template build succeeded"
